# Book Your Table at The Mana Feast

## Reservation Ritual

Fill out the magical form below to secure your dining quest! Choose your preferred time portal carefully.

```{=html}
<form>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="name" class="form-label">Adventurer's Name</label>
    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="name" required>
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="email" class="form-label">Magical Communication Crystal (Email)</label>
    <input type="email" class="form-control" id="email" required>
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="date" class="form-label">Preferred Dining Time</label>
    <input type="date" class="form-control" id="date" required>
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="guests" class="form-label">Number of Adventurers</label>
    <input type="number" class="form-control" id="guests" min="1" max="10" required>
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="specialRequests" class="form-label">Special Requests (Dietary Restrictions, Allergies)</label>
    <textarea class="form-control" id="specialRequests" rows="3"></textarea>
  </div>
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Summon Reservation</button>
</form>
```

## Reservation Guidelines

- Reservations are binding magical contracts
- Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before your scheduled time
- Maximum party size: 10 adventurers
- We accommodate most dietary restrictions and magical dietary needs

*Teleportation and portal services not included.*
